tooltip: Create a new database in a target group.
Edit information of an existing database (description, species, etc).
Clone all the contents of an existing database by creating a new database.
Unlocking the database allows you to expose database resources to the public. Once unlocked, you can use the key to view data without requiring authentication.
Publishing the database allows you to expose database resources to the public. Once published, the contents of the database can be viewed or exported by anyone without logging into Genboree.
